comprehension_passages.passage:
There are 10 students in a class named Scorpions.
2 of them like to play football, 3 of them like to play basketball and 5 like to play baseball.
They all like having fun while playing

In a beautiful country named Nearland, there lived a bear.
His name was Far and his best friend was a lion named Close.
When Close and Far wanted to play in Nearland, they went to a playground called Together
